gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Hornets 125, Pacers 124
gameRecap.excerpt: The Hornets defeated the Pacers, 125-124 tonight in Indiana. Mark Williams finished with a career-high 27 points along with seven rebounds and two steals for the Hornets, while Gordon Hayward tallied 23 points, six rebounds and three assists in the game. Tyrese Haliburton recorded 43 points, 12 assists and eight three pointers. The Hornets improve their record to 1-3 with the win, while the Pacers fall to 3-2 for the season.
